name: The Smurfs Travel the World
summary: The Smurfs Travel the World is a platform game based on the popular eponymous series released by Infogrames in 1994 for the Super NES, in 1995 for the Game Boy and Game Gear, and in 1996 for the Sega Mega Drive and Master System. The Master System version—titled The Smurfs 2—is notable for being the last commercial release for the console in Europe.
